title: Watch Wawrinka vs. Coric on Challenger TV
description: Stan Wawrinka and Borna Coric have faced off on big stages, including an ATP Tour final in Chennai nine years ago, won by the Swiss. On Thursday, the three-time major champion Wawrinka and Coric, former No. 12 in the PIF ATP Rankings, will clash at the Napoli Tennis Cup, an intimate and well-attended ATP Challenger Tour 125 event in southern Italy. Coric is on a 16-match winning streak at the Challenger level, having won three consecutive titles in the past month. He was crowned champion on home soil in Zadar, Croatia on Sunday. Wawrinka, who will celebrate his 40th birthday Friday, has defeated Coric three times at ATP Tour level. The Croatian won their most recent meeting in 2018 Shanghai. Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost.Watch Stan Wawrinka vs. Borna Coric (not before 1:30pm local time) In other Challenger action Thursday, former World No. 3 Marin Cilic will face top seed Marton Fucsovics at the Eurofirms Girona - Costa Brava in Spain. Pablo Carreno Busta, Dusan Lajovic and #NextGenATP star Nicolai Budkov Kjaer are also competing on the Girona clay.Watch Marton Fucsovics vs. Marin Cilic (not before 3:30pm local time) [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Stan Wawrinka and Borna Coric will clash at the Napoli Tennis Cup, an ATP Challenger Tour event, on Thursday. Fans can watch the match for free on Challenger TV.

html:
Challenger

Cilic, Fucsovics, Carreno Busta competing in Girona

March 28, 2025

Peter Staples/ATP Tour

Stan Wawrinka, former No. 3 in the PIF ATP Rankings, turns 40 years old on Friday. By ATP Staff

Stan Wawrinka and Borna Coric have faced off on big stages, including an ATP Tour final in Chennai nine years ago, won by the Swiss. On Thursday, the three-time major champion Wawrinka and Coric, former No. 12 in the PIF ATP Rankings, will clash at the Napoli Tennis Cup, an intimate and well-attended ATP Challenger Tour 125 event in southern Italy.

Coric is on a 16-match winning streak at the Challenger level, having won three consecutive titles in the past month. He was crowned champion on home soil in Zadar, Croatia on Sunday. Wawrinka, who will celebrate his 40th birthday Friday, has defeated Coric three times at ATP Tour level. The Croatian won their most recent meeting in 2018 Shanghai.

Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost.

Watch Stan Wawrinka vs. Borna Coric (not before 1:30pm local time)

In other Challenger action Thursday, former World No. 3 Marin Cilic will face top seed Marton Fucsovics at the Eurofirms Girona - Costa Brava in Spain. Pablo Carreno Busta, Dusan Lajovic and #NextGenATP star Nicolai Budkov Kjaer are also competing on the Girona clay.

Watch Marton Fucsovics vs. Marin Cilic (not before 3:30pm local time)
